text: 19.15: Sng 2.9; Ais 63.3; Jol 3.13; 2 Te 2.8; VB 1.16; 2.27; 4.8; 12.5; 14.19-20Mbe nɨman fharigi guma, guigira bɨrgi ntari ga mbui kos ana kamthoon hɨgim, ana ana ŋgɨɨav, mbe nɨman fharigi. Ana mba ntari ga mbui kozan, ana kha nuianan ki ŋgui bakɨvir ki gumgi gu mbigi mbevarga. Ana ainan muuŋgi mpiiŋsɨga suirav, za kha nuianan ki gumgi gu mbigi ganɨv, mben kora muuŋgirga fhu. Ana mba wainan vhɨgi, ana kɨman muuŋgi teŋk bakɨmen nta thiphogɨp, nta mbɨkmbɨgɨp, wainan muuŋgirga. Ne khaŋ muuŋgi, mba wain, ana guigira za kha ŋkasŋkagi ki Fhe Bakɨmen ndav shirɨ bakɨ guara panpana vhui.
